name: SmartyPants
0:
”Alexa, open smarty pants”
”Alexa, open smarty pants and play science”
”Alexa, open smarty pants and ask me animals questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smarty pants
des:
Smarty Pants is a visually immersive skill that puts your trivia skills to test. The skill keeps track of your score as you play.

We currently support the following categories - 
1. Science
2. Technology
3. Sustainability
4. Animals
5. General

Each game has ten questions and the skill keeps track of your score as you go through the game.

The skill is designed for both voice and visual devices. Try the skill on an Echo Show or a FireTV for a great visual better experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
